updateData.description:
This method creates a record given the field values and record info 
from the data set info. It creates and ID and uses standard permissions.

This creates a list of create instructions to go along with a list of records to be created.

There is the option to assign the ID or to leave it as undefined, in which case
an automatically incremented ID will be assigned. (For consistency in the data
set, either all records should be preassigned or all records should be 
automatically assigned.
This creates a body for a commit request, given a list of instructions and a commit message.
This creates the requestOptions, suitable for apogee.net.jsonRequest, to go with an type of request to the workingset (micemetarequest) server.
This function creates an update instruction given an initial and target record. If the records are the same then NULL is returned. (No update is needed.)
